phrases: I got it in a dungeon,
but you have more of a knack for the wind attribute.
I can feel power flowing through me.
Looks like you will get the hang of them in no time.
Anyway, would you like to go to a party with me this weekend?
Is not that just for nobles?
and I want to dance with you.
So you are fine with me dancing with other boys...
I will go to this party.
You probably would not notice if someone took me from you.
If someone kidnapped me and did questionable things to me...
You would probably think I was dirty and hate me.
Wh-What the heck is going on?
We cannot seem to find an open shop to use as our rare items shop.
They keep saying they will not rent or sell any space
to people who are not proper nobles!
Are they saying I am not a proper noble?!
In the plan to open a rare items shop...
My father's in charge of finding a location.
My job is to bring back items we can sell from the dungeon...
But the Stardia family is a baronet family, so we are always ridiculed.
That is also why I was hesitant to go to the party with Emma.
We do not need to be in any hurry, Father.
I had no faith in you to begin with.
Do you really have to say that?!
Father, do you have any clothes suitable for a party?
Emma's going to attend one, and I am going with her.
But it seems dirty and has a funny smell.
Well, I spilled some alcohol on it and just left it like that for years.
I will just buy a new one.
It is been so long, Noir.
Lord Ladan and Lady Romy, I am glad to see you are both well!
Look how much you have grown.
I remember the little boy wetting his pants like it was just yesterday.
Girls have a lot to do.
Did Emma tell you about today?
Ah, so she has not told you...
Sorry to keep you waiting, Noir.
Y-You do not look weird at all!
There is something that I must tell you.
A few days ago, I received a proclamation.
The sender was none other than... the Phantom Thief Phantom.
Phantom's the one everyone is been talking about lately.
It appears the thief wishes to steal my Mermaid's Tear, but that will not happen.
Adventurers from this kingdom's greatest guild, Lahmu, are guarding it!
Is that pretty lady a martial artist?
She is my age, and her level's that high?
The Mermaid's Tear has already been secured.
Phantom will never find the jewel!
enjoy tonight's gala in peace, with no fear of this petty thief!
I do not know anything about them.
There is nothing to worry about.
It is almost time to dance.
The dancers perform in order of their ranks.
Apparently, Emma and I are going last.
Mike from the House of Kentall.
You have become even more beautiful!
You are as dashing as ever, Lord Mike.
You have a way with words, as usual.
Emma is used to dealing with nobles.
To be honest, she seems a bit distant.
Miss Emma... would you reconsider my request to court you?
Does someone already have your heart?
I have been friends with Emma since we were little.
I belong to a baronet family.
Why do not we have a little competition?
Let us see who can lead Miss Emma better in this dance.
We will be wagering a date with her.
Hey, I did not agree to this!
The applause from the crowd will tell us who the winner is.
It is not like me to just accept a challenge like that.
But I could not bear to watch
Emma enjoying a conversation with someone else.
I have high hopes for you...
Mike's dance was top-notch... but I have to win.
We actually get to dance with each other.
Emma is right in front of you, Lord Noir.
When did he become such a good dancer?
We really are the best pair!
The one you have all been waiting for, Phantom Thief Phantom, is here!
As I proclaimed, I have come for the Mermaid's Tear
and the baron's daughter, Emma Brightness!
Sh-She is here to take Emma?
You probably would not notice if someone took me from you.
She must have received a notice, too...
But I did not even realize...
We are counting on you, adventurers from Lahmu!
You let your guard down, Earl.
Now we have taken both things we said we would take.
I will go after the guy!
I am an adventurer belonging to Odin!
Sorry, but you need to stay out of this.
Not because you belong to a rival guild,
but this is just too dangerous for an ordinary adventurer.
I will not let anyone take Emma!
Make sure you do not slow me down.
The Hidden Dungeon Only I Can Enter.
Be careful of her Summoning skill!
Well, I guess I do not need to hide that skill anymore.
This is your only chance to back off.
I would rather die than abandon her!
Well, are not you a feisty one?
You will not be able to save your precious friend like that.
That firebird is in the way!
If I can just delete Summoning...
LP needed to delete: 6000 Available LP: 5200
I do not have enough LP!
Every time we get closer, she escapes above!
I wonder who is going to die first.
I was able to see that you are weak against lightning with my Discerning Eye.
You cannot hit me if I am out of range!
The range for Lightning Strike is just three meters...
Looks like she is having a hard time, too.
She is getting steamed quite nicely.
Going up against that bird is the worst for her.
But now that the woman's away...
LP. 5200 To Get Creative and Bestow
LP. 4200 To Get Creative and Bestow
What do you think you are doing?!
I will use Water Drop to back you up!
I used my Magical Fusion skill to combine Water Drop and Lightning Strike.
I will take care of the rest!
Sh-She is still not waking up...
That is probably due to magic.
You are an amazing martial artist.
They have trained me ever since I was little.
I actually came here to study abroad with my younger brother and joined Lahmu.
Since I am in Odin, that makes you my rival.
That does not mean we cannot be friends, does it?
I caught him and handed him over to the earl.
That is why I came to back you up.
Thanks, but there is no need.
And did he always have that earring?
Just in case, I will use Discerning Eye.
Is this the Gravity Manipulation skill?
He is the other half of Phantom!
I am going to make Miss Emma my wife.
I have always taken whatever I wanted, you see.
I saw her around town, and it was love at first sight.
So I followed her and did some research.
And now... she is finally mine!
A weakling like you could never be the knight who protects her.
Do not do anything weird to my Noir!
Yeah, I can move just fine.
But did they do anything weird to me?
Do you think I am dirty now?
I thank you from the bottom of my heart.
I promise to repay you for this another day.
I am sure if I was kidnapped, Emma would come save me, too.
I would even go to the depths of Hell!
H-Her eyes are a bit scary...
To thank us, the earl agreed to help us get a location for our rare items shop.
It is on the market for 200,000 rels a month, but they agreed to 20,000 for us.
We can have it that cheap?!
They also agreed to let us remodel it,
so let us make it look really nice.
Mother and I will take care of the interior.
Brother Dearest, please continue to get us more items.
I will help with the shop, too.
A-Alice's eyes are scaring me a bit...
Next time, Let us Go to the Hot Springs.
